title: Bug 31460Weaving class loader
description: Bug 31460Weaving class loader Hi!As discussed on the mailing list a few days ago I implemented a weaving classloader to enable bytecode based weaving at class loading time. The class loaderis based on the URLClassLoader and can be used like any other URLClassLoader. These aspects gotwoven into each class that is loaded. The test cases for the class loader aren'timplemented yet, I am still thinking about how to implement them. I willcontribute them later, okay?Martin
OB: Inaddition to that you can add aspects to the weaving loader.
